  145: -export([list_cacerts/0]).  % debug exports

  147: 
  148: -define(TIMEOUT, 120000). % 2 min
  149: -define(PASSWORD1, "1234abcd").
  150: -define(PASSWORD2, "4567efgh").
  151: 
  152: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  153: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
  154: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  155: 
  156: suite() -> 
  157:     [].
  158: 
  159: all() -> 
  160:     [app, 
  161:      appup,
  162:      {group, pem_decode_encode},
  163:      encrypt_decrypt,
  164:      encrypt_decrypt_sign_fun,
  165:      {group, sign_verify},
  166:      pkix, 
  167:      pkix_countryname, 
  168:      pkix_emailaddress, 
  169:      pkix_decode_cert,
  170:      pkix_path_validation,
  171:      pkix_path_validation_root_expired,
  172:      pkix_ext_key_usage,
  173:      pkix_path_validation_bad_date,
  174:      pkix_iso_rsa_oid, 
  175:      pkix_iso_dsa_oid, 
  176:      pkix_dsa_sha2_oid,
  177:      pkix_crl, 
  178:      pkix_hash_type,
  179:      general_name,
  180:      pkix_verify_hostname_cn,
  181:      pkix_verify_hostname_subjAltName,
  182:      pkix_verify_hostname_subjAltName_IP,
  183:      pkix_verify_hostname_options,
  184:      pkix_dist_point_uri,
  185:      pkix_test_data_all_default,
  186:      pkix_test_data,
  187:      pkix_is_issuer,
  188:      short_cert_issuer_hash, 
  189:      short_crl_issuer_hash,
  190:      cacerts_load,
  191:      ocsp_extensions,
  192:      pkix_ocsp_validate
  193:     ].
  194: 
  195: groups() -> 
  196:     [{pem_decode_encode, [], [dsa_pem, rsa_pem, rsa_pss_pss_pem, 
  197:                               rsa_pss_default_pem, ec_pem,
  198: 			      encrypted_pem_pwdstring, encrypted_pem_pwdfun,
  199: 			      dh_pem, cert_pem, pkcs7_pem, pkcs10_pem, ec_pem2,
  200: 			      rsa_priv_pkcs8, dsa_priv_pkcs8, ec_priv_pkcs8,
  201: 			      eddsa_priv_pkcs8, eddsa_priv_rfc5958,
  202: 			      ec_pem_encode_generated, gen_ec_param_prime_field,
  203: 			      gen_ec_param_char_2_field]},
  204:      {sign_verify, [], [rsa_sign_verify, rsa_pss_sign_verify, dsa_sign_verify,
  205:                         eddsa_sign_verify_24_compat, custom_sign_fun_verify]}
  206:     ].
  207: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  208: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  209:     application:stop(crypto),
  210:     try crypto:start() of
  211:         ok ->
  212:             application:start(asn1),
  213:             Config
  214:     catch _:_ ->
  215: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  216:     end.
  217: 
  218: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  219:     application:stop(asn1),
  220:     application:stop(crypto).
  221: 
  222: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  223: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  224:     Config.
  225: 
  226: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  227:     Config.
  228: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  229: 
  230: init_per_testcase(pkix_test_data_all_default, Config) ->
  231:      case crypto:ec_curves() of
  232:          [] ->
  233:              {skip, missing_ecc_support};
  234:          _ ->
  235:              init_common_per_testcase(Config)
  236:      end;
  237: 
  238: init_per_testcase(gen_ec_param_prime_field=TC, Config) ->
  239:     init_per_testcase_gen_ec_param(TC, secp521r1, Config);
  240: 
  241: init_per_testcase(gen_ec_param_char_2_field=TC, Config) ->
  242:     init_per_testcase_gen_ec_param(TC, sect571r1, Config);
  243: 
  244: init_per_testcase(rsa_pss_sign_verify, Config) ->
  245:     Supports = crypto:supports(),
  246:     RSAOpts = proplists:get_value(rsa_opts, Supports),
  247: 
  248:     case lists:member(rsa_pkcs1_pss_padding, RSAOpts) 
  249:         andalso lists:member(rsa_pss_saltlen, RSAOpts) 
  250:         andalso lists:member(rsa_mgf1_md, RSAOpts) of
  251:         true ->
  252:             Config;
  253:         false ->
  254:             {skip, not_supported_by_crypto}
  255:     end;
  256: 
  257: init_per_testcase(eddsa_sign_verify_24_compat, Config) ->
  258:     case lists:member(eddsa, crypto:supports(public_keys)) of
  259:         true ->
  260:             Config;
  261:         false ->
  262:             {skip, eddsa_not_supported_by_crypto}
  263:     end;
  264: 
  265: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
  266:     case TestCase of
  267:         ec_pem_encode_generated ->
  268:             init_ec_pem_encode_generated(Config);
  269: 	_ -> init_common_per_testcase(Config)
  270:     end.
  271: 	
  272: init_common_per_testcase(Config0) ->
  273:     Config = lists:keydelete(watchdog, 1, Config0),
  274:     Dog = ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT),
  275:     [{watchdog, Dog} | Config].
  276: 
  277: 
  278: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
  279:     ok.
  280: 
  281: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  282: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  283: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  284: 
  285: app() ->
  286:     [{doc, "Test that the public_key app file is ok"}].
  287: app(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  288:     ok = test_server:app_test(public_key).
  289: 
  290: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  291: 
  292: appup() ->
  293:     [{doc, "Test that the public_key appup file is ok"}].
  294: appup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  295:     ok = test_server:appup_test(public_key).
  296: 
  297: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  298: 
  299: dsa_pem() ->
  300:     [{doc, "DSA PEM-file decode/encode"}].
  301: dsa_pem(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  302:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  303: 
  304:      [{'DSAPrivateKey', DerDSAKey, not_encrypted} = Entry0 ] =
  305: 	erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "dsa.pem")),
  306: 
  307:     DSAKey = public_key:der_decode('DSAPrivateKey', DerDSAKey),
  308: 
  309:     DSAKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry0),
  310: 
  311:     {ok, DSAPubPem} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "dsa_pub.pem")),
  312:     [{'SubjectPublicKeyInfo', _, _} = PubEntry0] =
  313:         public_key:pem_decode(DSAPubPem),
  314:     DSAPubKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(PubEntry0),
  315:     true = check_entry_type(DSAPubKey, 'DSAPublicKey'),
  316:     PubEntry0 = public_key:pem_entry_encode('SubjectPublicKeyInfo', DSAPubKey),
  317:     DSAPubPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(DSAPubPem),
  318:     DSAPubPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(public_key:pem_encode([PubEntry0])).
  319: 
  320: dsa_priv_pkcs8() ->
  321:     [{doc, "DSA PKCS8 private key decode/encode"}].
  322: dsa_priv_pkcs8(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  323:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  324:     {ok, DsaPem} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "dsa_key_pkcs8.pem")),
  325:     [{'PrivateKeyInfo', DerDSAKey, not_encrypted} = Entry0 ] = public_key:pem_decode(DsaPem),
  326:     DSAKey = public_key:der_decode('PrivateKeyInfo', DerDSAKey),
  327:     DSAKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry0),
  328:     true = check_entry_type(DSAKey, 'DSAPrivateKey'),
  329:     PrivEntry0 = public_key:pem_entry_encode('PrivateKeyInfo', DSAKey),
  330:     DSAPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(DsaPem),
  331:     DSAPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(public_key:pem_encode([PrivEntry0])).
  332: 
  333: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  334: 
  335: rsa_pem() ->
  336:     [{doc, "RSA PEM-file decode/encode"}].
  337: rsa_pem(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  338:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  339:     [{'RSAPrivateKey', DerRSAKey, not_encrypted} =  Entry0 ] =
  340: 	erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "client_key.pem")),
  341: 
  342:     RSAKey0 = public_key:der_decode('RSAPrivateKey', DerRSAKey),
  343: 
  344:     RSAKey0 = public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry0),
  345:     
  346:     [{'RSAPrivateKey', _, {_,_}} = Entry1] =
  347: 	erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "rsa.pem")),
  348: 
  349:     true = check_entry_type(public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry1, "abcd1234"),
  350: 			    'RSAPrivateKey'),
  351: 
  352:     {ok, RSAPubPem} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "rsa_pub.pem")),
  353:     [{'SubjectPublicKeyInfo', _, _} = PubEntry0] =
  354:         public_key:pem_decode(RSAPubPem),
  355:     RSAPubKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(PubEntry0),
  356:     true = check_entry_type(RSAPubKey, 'RSAPublicKey'),
  357:     PubEntry0 = public_key:pem_entry_encode('SubjectPublicKeyInfo', RSAPubKey),
  358:     RSAPubPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(RSAPubPem),
  359:     RSAPubPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(public_key:pem_encode([PubEntry0])),
  360: 
  361:     {ok, RSARawPem} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "rsa_pub_key.pem")),
  362:     [{'RSAPublicKey', _, _} = PubEntry1] =
  363:         public_key:pem_decode(RSARawPem),
  364:     RSAPubKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(PubEntry1),
  365:     RSARawPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(RSARawPem),
  366:     RSARawPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(public_key:pem_encode([PubEntry1])).
  367: 
  368: rsa_pss_pss_pem() ->
  369:     [{doc, "RSA PKCS8 RSASSA-PSS private key decode/encode"}].
  370: rsa_pss_pss_pem(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  371:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  372:     {ok, RsaPem} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "rsa_pss_pss_key.pem")),
  373:     [{'PrivateKeyInfo', DerRSAKey, not_encrypted} = Entry0 ] = public_key:pem_decode(RsaPem),
  374:     {RSAKey, Parms} = public_key:der_decode('PrivateKeyInfo', DerRSAKey),
  375:     {RSAKey, Parms} = public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry0),
  376:     true = check_entry_type(RSAKey, 'RSAPrivateKey'),
  377:     PrivEntry0 = public_key:pem_entry_encode('PrivateKeyInfo', {RSAKey, Parms}),
  378:     RSAPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(RsaPem),
  379:     RSAPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(public_key:pem_encode([PrivEntry0])).
  380: 
  381: rsa_pss_default_pem() ->
  382:     [{doc, "RSA PKCS8 RSASSA-PSS private key with default params decode/encode"}].
  383: rsa_pss_default_pem(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  384:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  385:     {ok, RsaPem} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "pss_default.pem")),
  386:     [{'PrivateKeyInfo', DerRSAKey, not_encrypted} = Entry0 ] = public_key:pem_decode(RsaPem),
  387:     {_,_,Params} = ?'rSASSA-PSS-Default-Identifier',
  388:     {RSAKey, Params} = public_key:der_decode('PrivateKeyInfo', DerRSAKey),
  389:     {RSAKey, Parms} = public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry0),
  390:     true = check_entry_type(RSAKey, 'RSAPrivateKey'),
  391:     PrivEntry0 = public_key:pem_entry_encode('PrivateKeyInfo', {RSAKey, Parms}),
  392:     RSAPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(RsaPem),
  393:     RSAPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(public_key:pem_encode([PrivEntry0])).
  394: 
  395: rsa_priv_pkcs8() ->
  396:     [{doc, "RSA PKCS8 private key decode/encode"}].
  397: rsa_priv_pkcs8(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  398:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  399:     {ok, RsaPem} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "rsa_key_pkcs8.pem")),
  400:     [{'PrivateKeyInfo', DerRSAKey, not_encrypted} = Entry0 ] = public_key:pem_decode(RsaPem),
  401:     RSAKey = public_key:der_decode('PrivateKeyInfo', DerRSAKey),
  402:     RSAKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry0),
  403:     true = check_entry_type(RSAKey, 'RSAPrivateKey'),
  404:     PrivEntry0 = public_key:pem_entry_encode('PrivateKeyInfo', RSAKey),
  405:     RSAPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(RsaPem),
  406:     RSAPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(public_key:pem_encode([PrivEntry0])).
  407: 
  408: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  409: 
  410: ec_pem() ->
  411:     [{doc, "EC key PEM-file decode/encode"}].
  412: ec_pem(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  413:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  414:     {ok, ECPubPem} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "ec_pubkey.pem")),
  415:     [{'SubjectPublicKeyInfo', _, _} = PubEntry0] =
  416:         public_key:pem_decode(ECPubPem),
  417:     ECPubKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(PubEntry0),
  418:     true = check_entry_type(ECPubKey, 'ECPoint'),
  419:     PubEntry0 = public_key:pem_entry_encode('SubjectPublicKeyInfo', ECPubKey),
  420:     ECPubPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(ECPubPem),
  421:     ECPubPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(public_key:pem_encode([PubEntry0])),
  422:     
  423:     {ok, ECPrivPem} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "ec_key.pem")),
  424:     [{'EcpkParameters', _, not_encrypted} = Entry1,
  425:      {'ECPrivateKey', _, not_encrypted} = Entry2] = public_key:pem_decode(ECPrivPem),
  426:     
  427:     ECParams = public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry1),
  428:     true = check_entry_type(ECParams, 'EcpkParameters'),
  429:     ECPrivKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry2),
  430:     true = check_entry_type(ECPrivKey, 'ECPrivateKey'),
  431:     true = check_entry_type(ECPrivKey#'ECPrivateKey'.parameters, 'EcpkParameters'),
  432:     ECPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(ECPrivPem),
  433:     ECPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(public_key:pem_encode([Entry1, Entry2])).
  434:     
  435: ec_pem2() ->
  436:     [{doc, "EC key w/explicit params PEM-file decode/encode"}].
  437: ec_pem2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  438:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  439: 
  440:     %% Load key with explicit curve parameters.  Generated with...
  441:     %% openssl ecparam -name secp521r1 -genkey -param_enc explicit -out ec_key2.pem
  442:     {ok, ECPrivPem} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "ec_key2.pem")),
  443:     [{'EcpkParameters', _, not_encrypted} = Entry1,
  444:      {'ECPrivateKey', _, not_encrypted} = Entry2] = public_key:pem_decode(ECPrivPem),
  445: 
  446:     ECParams = public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry1),
  447:     true = check_entry_type(ECParams, 'EcpkParameters'),
  448:     ECPrivKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry2),
  449:     true = check_entry_type(ECPrivKey, 'ECPrivateKey'),
  450:     true = check_entry_type(ECPrivKey#'ECPrivateKey'.parameters, 'EcpkParameters'),
  451:     ECPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(ECPrivPem),
  452:     ECPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(public_key:pem_encode([Entry1, Entry2])).
  453: 
  454: ec_priv_pkcs8() ->
  455:     [{doc, "EC PKCS8 private key decode/encode"}].
  456: ec_priv_pkcs8(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  457:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  458:     {ok, ECPrivPem} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "ec_key_pkcs8.pem")),
  459:     [{'PrivateKeyInfo', _, not_encrypted} = PKCS8Key] = public_key:pem_decode(ECPrivPem),
  460:     ECPrivKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(PKCS8Key),
  461:     true = check_entry_type(ECPrivKey, 'ECPrivateKey'),
  462:     true = check_entry_type(ECPrivKey#'ECPrivateKey'.parameters, 'EcpkParameters'),
  463:     PrivEntry0 = public_key:pem_entry_encode('PrivateKeyInfo', ECPrivKey),
  464:     ECPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(ECPrivPem),
  465:     ECPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(public_key:pem_encode([PrivEntry0])).
  466: 
  467: eddsa_priv_pkcs8() ->
  468:     [{doc, "EDDSA PKCS8 private key decode/encode"}].
  469: eddsa_priv_pkcs8(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  470:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  471:     {ok, ECPrivPem} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "eddsa_key_pkcs8.pem")),
  472:     [{'PrivateKeyInfo', _, not_encrypted} = PKCS8Key] = public_key:pem_decode(ECPrivPem),
  473:     ECPrivKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(PKCS8Key),
  474:     true = check_entry_type(ECPrivKey, 'ECPrivateKey'),
  475:     true = ECPrivKey#'ECPrivateKey'.parameters == {namedCurve, ?'id-Ed25519'},
  476:     true = size(ECPrivKey#'ECPrivateKey'.privateKey) == 32,
  477:     PrivEntry0 = public_key:pem_entry_encode('PrivateKeyInfo', ECPrivKey),
  478:     ECPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(ECPrivPem),
  479:     ECPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(public_key:pem_encode([PrivEntry0])).
  480: 
  481: eddsa_priv_rfc5958() ->
  482:     [{doc, "EDDSA PKCS8 private key decode/encode"}].
  483: eddsa_priv_rfc5958(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  484:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  485:     {ok, ECPrivPem} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "eddsa_key_rfc5958.pem")),
  486:     [{'PrivateKeyInfo', _, not_encrypted} = PKCS8Key] = public_key:pem_decode(ECPrivPem),
  487:     ECPrivKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(PKCS8Key),
  488:     true = check_entry_type(ECPrivKey, 'ECPrivateKey'),
  489:     true = ECPrivKey#'ECPrivateKey'.parameters == {namedCurve, ?'id-Ed25519'},
  490:     true = size(ECPrivKey#'ECPrivateKey'.privateKey) == 32,
  491:     PrivEntry0 = public_key:pem_entry_encode('OneAsymmetricKey', ECPrivKey),
  492:     ECPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(ECPrivPem),
  493:     ECPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(public_key:pem_encode([PrivEntry0])).
  494: 
  495: eddsa_sign_verify_24_compat(_Config) ->
  496:     Key =
  497:         {'ECPrivateKey',1,
  498:          <<15,192,10,239,169,93,9,105,143,13,221,71,191,255,201,
  499:            60,8,80,43,234,82,68,151,219,233,144,174,41,227,241,
  500:            229,232>>,
  501:          {namedCurve,{1,3,101,112}},
  502:          <<209,208,142,135,125,251,57,203,2,49,232,74,238,214,170,
  503:            181,23,107,221,39,187,225,106,19,34,133,117,198,138,
  504:            180,16,70>>,
  505:          asn1_NOVALUE},
  506:     Body =
  507:         <<83,83,72,83,73,71,0,0,0,4,116,101,120,116,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,6,115,104,97,
  508:           53,49,50,0,0,0,64,119,199,206,154,93,134,187,56,109,68,59,185,99,144,
  509:           250,161,32,99,49,88,105,156,136,68,195,11,19,171,11,249,39,96,183,228,
  510:           65,106,234,57,125,185,27,74,192,229,221,86,184,239,126,75,6,97,98,171,
  511:           31,220,8,131,25,206,109,239,200,118>>,
  512:     ExpectedSignature =
  513:         <<203,148,171,54,165,4,216,251,189,124,35,227,88,183,187,225,142,10,132,163,98,
  514:           48,167,195,67,12,49,148,85,146,41,14,58,0,198,68,103,114,90,61,31,38,200,198,
  515:           64,179,135,138,31,172,236,105,0,71,50,195,168,247,216,110,210,61,159,5>>,
  516:     lists:foreach(
  517:       fun(Sha) ->
  518:               ct:log("Try Sha = ~p", [Sha]),
  519:               try
  520:                   case public_key:sign(Body, Sha, Key) of
  521:                       ExpectedSignature ->
  522:                           ct:log("sign Sha ~p ok", [Sha]),
  523:                           ExpectedSignature;
  524:                       Others ->
  525:                           ct:log("Sha: ~p~nGot:    ~p~nExpect: ~p", [Sha,Others,ExpectedSignature]),
  526:                           ct:fail("Bad sign result")
  527:                   end
  528:               of
  529:                   Sig ->
  530:                       try
  531:                           case public_key:verify(Body, Sha, Sig, Key) of
  532:                               true ->
  533:                                   ct:log("verify Sha ~p ok", [Sha]);
  534:                               false ->
  535:                                   ct:fail("Bad verify result for ~p",[Sha])
  536:                           end
  537:                       catch
  538:                           C:E ->
  539:                               ct:log("Verify: ~p:~p  Sha = ~p", [C,E,Sha]),
  540:                               ct:fail("Bad verify",[])
  541:                       end
  542:               catch
  543:                   C:E ->
  544:                       ct:log("Sign: ~p:~p  Sha = ~p", [C,E,Sha]),
  545:                       ct:fail("Bad sign",[])
  546:               end
  547:       end, [undefined, none | crypto:supports(hashs)]).
  548: 
  549: 
  550: init_ec_pem_encode_generated(Config) ->
  551:     case catch true = lists:member('secp384r1', crypto:ec_curves()) of
  552:         {'EXIT', _} -> {skip, {'secp384r1', not_supported}};
  553:         _           -> init_common_per_testcase(Config)
  554:     end.
  555: 
  556: ec_pem_encode_generated() ->
  557:     [{doc, "PEM-encode generated EC key"}].
  558: ec_pem_encode_generated(_Config) ->
  559: 
  560:     Key1 = public_key:generate_key({namedCurve, 'secp384r1'}),
  561:     public_key:pem_entry_encode('ECPrivateKey', Key1),
  562: 
  563:     Key2 = public_key:generate_key({namedCurve, ?'secp384r1'}),
  564:     public_key:pem_entry_encode('ECPrivateKey', Key2).
  565: 
  566: 
  567: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  568: 
  569: encrypted_pem_pwdstring() ->
  570:     [{doc, "Encrypted PEM-file decode/encode with password string used"}].
  571: encrypted_pem_pwdstring(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  572:     encrypted_pem(Config, ?PASSWORD1, ?PASSWORD2).
  573: 
  574: encrypted_pem_pwdfun() ->
  575:     [{doc, "Encrypted PEM-file decode/encode with password fun used"}].
  576: encrypted_pem_pwdfun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  577:     encrypted_pem(Config, fun() -> ?PASSWORD1 end, fun() -> ?PASSWORD2 end).
  578: 
  579: encrypted_pem(Config, Password1, Password2) ->
  580:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  581:     [{'RSAPrivateKey', DerRSAKey, not_encrypted}] =
  582:         erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "client_key.pem")),
  583:     RSAKey = public_key:der_decode('RSAPrivateKey', DerRSAKey),
  584:     SupportedCiphers = crypto:supports(ciphers),
  585:     SupportedECB = lists:member(des_ecb, SupportedCiphers),
  586:     SupportedDES = lists:member(des_cbc, SupportedCiphers),
  587:     case SupportedECB of
  588:         true ->
  589:             encrypted_pem_des_ede(Datadir, RSAKey, Password1);
  590:         false ->
  591:             ct:comment("DES-EDE3-CBC not supported")
  592:     end,
  593:     case SupportedDES of
  594:         true ->
  595:             encrypted_pem_des_cbc(Datadir, RSAKey, Password2);
  596:         false ->
  597:             ct:comment("DES-CBC not supported")
  598:     end.
  599: encrypted_pem_des_ede(Datadir, RSAKey, Password) ->
  600:     Salt = crypto:strong_rand_bytes(8),
  601:     Entry = public_key:pem_entry_encode('RSAPrivateKey', RSAKey,
  602:                                         {{"DES-EDE3-CBC", Salt}, ?PASSWORD1}),
  603:     RSAKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry, Password),
  604:     Des3KeyFile = filename:join(Datadir, "des3_client_key.pem"),
  605:     erl_make_certs:der_to_pem(Des3KeyFile, [Entry]),
  606:     [{'RSAPrivateKey', _, {"DES-EDE3-CBC", Salt}}] =
  607:         erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(Des3KeyFile).
  608: 
  609: encrypted_pem_des_cbc(Datadir, RSAKey, Password) ->
  610:     Salt = crypto:strong_rand_bytes(8),
  611:     Entry = public_key:pem_entry_encode('RSAPrivateKey', RSAKey,
  612:                                         {{"DES-CBC", Salt}, ?PASSWORD2}),
  613:     DesKeyFile = filename:join(Datadir, "des_client_key.pem"),
  614:     erl_make_certs:der_to_pem(DesKeyFile, [Entry]),
  615:     [{'RSAPrivateKey', _, {"DES-CBC", Salt}} = Entry] =
  616:         erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(DesKeyFile),
  617:     {ok, Pem} = file:read_file(DesKeyFile),
  618:     check_encapsulated_header(Pem),
  619:     true = check_entry_type(public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry, Password),
  620:                             'RSAPrivateKey').
  621: 
  622: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  623: 
  624: dh_pem() ->
  625:     [{doc, "DH parametrs PEM-file decode/encode"}].
  626: dh_pem(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  627:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  628:     [{'DHParameter', _DerDH, not_encrypted} = Entry] =
  629: 	erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "dh.pem")),
  630:     asn1_encode_decode(Entry).
  631: 
  632: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  633: 
  634: pkcs10_pem() ->
  635:    [{doc, "PKCS-10 PEM-file decode/encode"}].
  636: pkcs10_pem(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  637:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  638:     [{'CertificationRequest', _DerPKCS10, not_encrypted} = Entry] =
  639: 	erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "req.pem")),
  640:     asn1_encode_decode(Entry).
  641: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  642: pkcs7_pem() ->
  643:     [{doc, "PKCS-7 PEM-file decode/encode"}].
  644: pkcs7_pem(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  645:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  646:     [{'ContentInfo', _, not_encrypted} = Entry0] =
  647: 	erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "pkcs7_cert.pem")),
  648:     [{'ContentInfo', _, not_encrypted} = Entry1] =
  649: 	erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "pkcs7_ext.pem")),
  650:     asn1_encode_decode(Entry0),
  651:     asn1_encode_decode(Entry1).
  652:       
  653: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  654: cert_pem() ->
  655:     [{doc, "Certificate PEM-file decode/encode"}].
  656: cert_pem(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  657:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  658:    
  659:     [{'Certificate', _, not_encrypted} = Entry0] =  
  660: 	erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "client_cert.pem")),
  661:     
  662:     asn1_encode_decode(Entry0),
  663:     
  664:     [{'Certificate', _, not_encrypted} = Entry1, 
  665:      {'Certificate', _, not_encrypted} = Entry2] = 
  666:         erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "cacerts.pem")),
  667:     
  668:     asn1_encode_decode(Entry1),
  669:     asn1_encode_decode(Entry2).
  670: 
  671: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  672: encrypt_decrypt() ->
  673:     [{doc, "Test public_key:encrypt_private and public_key:decrypt_public"}].
  674: encrypt_decrypt(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  675:     {PrivateKey, _DerKey} = erl_make_certs:gen_rsa(64),
  676:     #'RSAPrivateKey'{modulus=Mod, publicExponent=Exp} = PrivateKey,
  677:     PublicKey = #'RSAPublicKey'{modulus=Mod, publicExponent=Exp},
  678:     Msg = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(5, "Foo bar 100")),
  679:     RsaEncrypted = public_key:encrypt_private(Msg, PrivateKey),
  680:     Msg = public_key:decrypt_public(RsaEncrypted, PublicKey),
  681:     RsaEncrypted2 = public_key:encrypt_public(Msg, PublicKey),
  682:     Msg = public_key:decrypt_private(RsaEncrypted2, PrivateKey),
  683:     ok.
  684: 
  685: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  686: encrypt_decrypt_sign_fun() ->
  687:     [{doc, "Test public_key:encrypt_private with user provided sign_fun"}].
  688: encrypt_decrypt_sign_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  689:     {PrivateKey, _DerKey} = erl_make_certs:gen_rsa(64),
  690:     #'RSAPrivateKey'{modulus=Mod, publicExponent=Exp} = PrivateKey,
  691:     EncryptFun = fun (PlainText, Options) ->
  692:             public_key:encrypt_private(PlainText, PrivateKey, Options)
  693:         end,
  694:     CustomPrivKey = #{encrypt_fun => EncryptFun},
  695:     PublicKey = #'RSAPublicKey'{modulus=Mod, publicExponent=Exp},
  696:     Msg = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(5, "Foo bar 100")),
  697:     RsaEncrypted = public_key:encrypt_private(Msg, CustomPrivKey),
  698:     Msg = public_key:decrypt_public(RsaEncrypted, PublicKey),
  699:     ok.
  700:        
  701: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  702: rsa_sign_verify() ->
  703:     [{doc, "Checks that we can sign and verify rsa signatures."}].
  704: rsa_sign_verify(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  705:     Ca = {_, CaKey} = erl_make_certs:make_cert([]),
  706:     {Cert1, _} = erl_make_certs:make_cert([{key, dsa}, {issuer, Ca}]),
  707:     PrivateRSA = #'RSAPrivateKey'{modulus=Mod, publicExponent=Exp} = 
  708: 	public_key:pem_entry_decode(CaKey),
  709:     PublicRSA = #'RSAPublicKey'{modulus=Mod, publicExponent=Exp},
  710:     true = public_key:pkix_verify(Cert1, PublicRSA),
  711: 
  712:     Msg = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(5, "Foo bar 100")),
  713:     RSASign = public_key:sign(Msg, sha, PrivateRSA),
  714:     true = public_key:verify(Msg, sha, RSASign, PublicRSA), 
  715:     false = public_key:verify(<<1:8, Msg/binary>>, sha, RSASign, PublicRSA), 
  716:     false = public_key:verify(Msg, sha, <<1:8, RSASign/binary>>, PublicRSA), 
  717: 
  718:     RSASign1 = public_key:sign(Msg, md5, PrivateRSA),
  719:     true = public_key:verify(Msg, md5, RSASign1, PublicRSA).
  720:     
  721: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  722: rsa_pss_sign_verify() ->
  723:     [{doc, "Checks that we can sign and verify rsa pss signatures."}].
  724: rsa_pss_sign_verify(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  725:     CertChainConf  = #{server_chain => 
  726:                            #{root => [],
  727:                              intermediates => [],
  728:                              peer => []},
  729:                        client_chain => 
  730:                            #{root => [{key, {hardcode_rsa_key(1), pss_params(sha256)}}],
  731:                              intermediates => [],
  732:                              peer => []}},
  733:     #{client_config := ClientConf} = public_key:pkix_test_data(CertChainConf),
  734:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ClientConf),
  735:     {#'RSAPrivateKey'{modulus=Mod, publicExponent=Exp}, Parms} = {hardcode_rsa_key(1), pss_params(sha256)},
  736:            
  737:     true = public_key:pkix_verify(Cert, {#'RSAPublicKey'{modulus=Mod, publicExponent=Exp}, Parms}).
  738:     
  739: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  740: 
  741: dsa_sign_verify() ->
  742:     [{doc, "Checks that we can sign and verify dsa signatures."}].
  743: dsa_sign_verify(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  744:     Ca = erl_make_certs:make_cert([]),
  745:     CertInfo = {_,CertKey1} = erl_make_certs:make_cert([{key, dsa}, {issuer, Ca}]),
  746:     {Cert2,_CertKey} = erl_make_certs:make_cert([{issuer, CertInfo}]),
  747: 
  748:     #'DSAPrivateKey'{p=P, q=Q, g=G, y=Y, x=_X} =
  749: 	public_key:pem_entry_decode(CertKey1),
  750:     true = public_key:pkix_verify(Cert2, {Y, #'Dss-Parms'{p=P, q=Q, g=G}}),
  751: 
  752:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  753:     [DsaKey = {'DSAPrivateKey', _, _}] = 
  754: 	erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "dsa.pem")), 
  755:     DSAPrivateKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(DsaKey),
  756:     #'DSAPrivateKey'{p=P1, q=Q1, g=G1, y=Y1, x=_X1} = DSAPrivateKey,
  757: 
  758:     Msg = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(5, "Foo bar 100")),
  759:     DSASign = public_key:sign(Msg, sha, DSAPrivateKey),
  760:     DSAPublicKey = Y1,
  761:     DSAParams = #'Dss-Parms'{p=P1, q=Q1, g=G1},
  762:     true = public_key:verify(Msg, sha, DSASign, {DSAPublicKey, DSAParams}), 
  763:     false = public_key:verify(<<1:8, Msg/binary>>, sha, DSASign, 
  764: 			      {DSAPublicKey, DSAParams}), 
  765:     false = public_key:verify(Msg, sha, <<1:8, DSASign/binary>>, 
  766: 			      {DSAPublicKey, DSAParams}), 
  767:     
  768:     Digest = crypto:hash(sha,Msg),
  769:     DigestSign = public_key:sign(Digest, none, DSAPrivateKey),
  770:     true = public_key:verify(Digest, none, DigestSign, {DSAPublicKey, DSAParams}), 
  771:     <<_:8, RestDigest/binary>> = Digest,
  772:     false = public_key:verify(<<1:8, RestDigest/binary>>, none, DigestSign, 
  773: 			      {DSAPublicKey, DSAParams}), 
  774:     false = public_key:verify(Digest, none, <<1:8, DigestSign/binary>>, 
  775: 			      {DSAPublicKey, DSAParams}).
  776: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  777: 
  778: custom_sign_fun_verify() ->
  779:     [{doc, "Checks that public_key:sign correctly calls the `sign_fun`"}].
  780: custom_sign_fun_verify(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  781:     {_, CaKey} = erl_make_certs:make_cert([{key, rsa}]),
  782:     PrivateRSA = public_key:pem_entry_decode(CaKey),
  783:     #'RSAPrivateKey'{modulus=Mod, publicExponent=Exp} = PrivateRSA,
  784:     PublicRSA = #'RSAPublicKey'{modulus=Mod, publicExponent=Exp},
  785:     SignFun = fun (Msg, HashAlgo, Options) ->
  786:             public_key:sign(Msg, HashAlgo, PrivateRSA, Options)
  787:         end,
  788:     CustomKey = #{algorithm => rsa, sign_fun => SignFun},
  789: 
  790:     Msg = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(5, "Foo bar 100")),
  791:     RSASign = public_key:sign(Msg, sha, CustomKey),
  792:     true = public_key:verify(Msg, sha, RSASign, PublicRSA),
  793:     false = public_key:verify(<<1:8, Msg/binary>>, sha, RSASign, PublicRSA),
  794:     false = public_key:verify(Msg, sha, <<1:8, RSASign/binary>>, PublicRSA),
  795: 
  796:     RSASign1 = public_key:sign(Msg, md5, CustomKey),
  797:     true = public_key:verify(Msg, md5, RSASign1, PublicRSA).
  798: 
  799: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  800: pkix() ->
  801:     [{doc, "Misc pkix tests not covered elsewhere"}].
  802: pkix(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  803:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  804:     Certs0 = erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "cacerts.pem")),
  805:     Certs1 = erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "client_cert.pem")),
  806:     TestTransform = fun({'Certificate', CertDer, not_encrypted}) ->
  807: 			    PlainCert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(CertDer, plain),
  808: 			    OtpCert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(CertDer, otp),
  809: 			    CertDer = 
  810: 				public_key:pkix_encode('OTPCertificate', OtpCert, otp),
  811: 			    CertDer = 
  812: 				public_key:pkix_encode('Certificate', PlainCert, plain),
  813: 			    OTPTBS = OtpCert#'OTPCertificate'.tbsCertificate,
  814: 			    OTPSubj = OTPTBS#'OTPTBSCertificate'.subject, 
  815: 			    DNEncoded = public_key:pkix_encode('Name', OTPSubj, otp),
  816: 			    PlainTBS = PlainCert#'Certificate'.tbsCertificate,
  817: 			    Subj2 = PlainTBS#'TBSCertificate'.subject,
  818: 			    DNEncoded = public_key:pkix_encode('Name', Subj2, plain),
  819: 
  820: 			    false = public_key:pkix_is_fixed_dh_cert(CertDer)
  821: 		    end,
  822:     [TestTransform(Cert) || Cert <- Certs0 ++ Certs1],
  823: 
  824:     Root = element(2, hd(Certs0)),
  825:     Peer = element(2, hd(Certs1)), 
  826: 
  827:     true = public_key:pkix_is_self_signed(Root),
  828:     false = public_key:pkix_is_self_signed(Peer),
  829: 
  830:     CaIds = [element(2, public_key:pkix_issuer_id(Cert, self)) || 
  831: 		{'Certificate', Cert, _} <- Certs0],
  832:     {ok, IssuerId} = 
  833: 	public_key:pkix_issuer_id(Peer, other),
  834:     
  835:     {ok, Id} = public_key:pkix_issuer_id(Root, self),
  836:     Id = public_key:pkix_subject_id(Root),
  837: 
  838:     true = lists:member(IssuerId, CaIds),
  839: 
  840:     %% Should be normalized already
  841:     TestStr   = {rdnSequence, 
  842: 		 [[{'AttributeTypeAndValue', {2,5,4,3},{printableString,"ERLANGCA"}}],
  843: 		  [{'AttributeTypeAndValue', {2,5,4,3},{printableString," erlang  ca "}}]]},
  844:     VerifyStr = {rdnSequence, 
  845: 		 [[{'AttributeTypeAndValue', {2,5,4,3},{printableString,"erlangca"}}],
  846: 		  [{'AttributeTypeAndValue', {2,5,4,3},{printableString,"erlang ca"}}]]},   
  847:     VerifyStr = public_key:pkix_normalize_name(TestStr).
  848:     
  849:   
  850: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  851: pkix_countryname() ->
  852:     [{doc, "Test workaround for certs that code x509countryname as utf8"}].
  853: pkix_countryname(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  854:     Cert = incorrect_countryname_pkix_cert(),
  855:     OTPCert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Cert, otp),
  856:     TBSCert = OTPCert#'OTPCertificate'.tbsCertificate,
  857:     Issuer = TBSCert#'OTPTBSCertificate'.issuer,
  858:     Subj   = TBSCert#'OTPTBSCertificate'.subject,
  859:     check_countryname(Issuer),
  860:     check_countryname(Subj).
  861: 
  862: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  863: pkix_emailaddress() ->
  864:     [{doc, "Test workaround for certs that code emailAddress as utf8"}].
  865: pkix_emailaddress(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  866:     Cert = incorrect_emailaddress_pkix_cert(),
  867:     OTPCert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Cert, otp),
  868:     TBSCert = OTPCert#'OTPCertificate'.tbsCertificate,
  869:     Issuer = TBSCert#'OTPTBSCertificate'.issuer,
  870:     Subj   = TBSCert#'OTPTBSCertificate'.subject,
  871:     check_emailaddress(Issuer),
  872:     check_emailaddress(Subj).
  873: 
  874: 
  875: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  876: pkix_decode_cert() ->
  877:     [{doc, "Test that extension IssuerDistributionPoint is not decoded in 'otp' decoding mode. We want to leave it for later "
  878:       "to increase interopability for sites that does not use this extension and will not care if it is properly encoded"}].
  879: pkix_decode_cert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  880:     Der = base64:decode(
  881:             <<"MIICXDCCAgKgAwIBAgIBATAKBggqhkjOPQQDAjApMRkwFwYDVQQFExBjOTY4NDI4OTMyNzUwOGRiMQwwCgYDVQQMDANURUUwHhcNMjIxMDI5MTczMTA3WhcNMjkwNDE2MjAzNDUzWjAfMR0wGwYDVQQDExRBbmRyb2lkIEtleXN0b3JlIEtleTBZMBMGByqGSM49AgEGCCqGSM49AwEHA0IABFmIQDus/jIZ0cPnRCITCzUUuCjQBw8MetO6154mmTL8O/fFlGgYkZ6C8jSSntKC/lMwaZHxAgW1AGgoCrPuX5ejggEjMIIBHzALBgNVHQ8EBAMCB4AwCAYDVR0fBAEAMIIBBAYKKwYBBAHWeQIBEQSB9TCB8gIBAgoBAQIBAwoBAQQgyvsSa116xqleaXs6xA84wqpAPWFgaaTjCWBnZpHslmoEADBEv4VFQAQ+MDwxFjAUBAxjb20ud2hhdHNhcHACBA0+oAQxIgQgOYfQQ9EK769ahxCzZxQY/lfg4ZtlPJ34JVj+tf/OXUQweqEFMQMCAQKiAwIBA6MEAgIBAKUIMQYCAQYCAQSqAwIBAb+DdwIFAL+FPQgCBgGEJMweob+FPgMCAQC/hUAqMCgEIFNB5rJkaXmnDldlMAeh8xAWlCHsm92fGlZI91reAFrxAQH/CgEAv4VBBQIDAV+Qv4VCBQIDAxUYMAoGCCqGSM49BAMCA0gAMEUCIF0BwvRQipVoaz5SIhsYbIeK+FHbAjWPgOxWgQ6Juq64AiEA83ZLsK37DjZ/tZNRi271VHQqIU8mdqUIMboVUiy3DaM=">>),
  882: 
  883:     #'OTPCertificate'{} = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Der, otp).
  884: 
  885: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  886: pkix_path_validation() ->
  887:     [{doc, "Test PKIX path validation"}].
  888: pkix_path_validation(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  889:     CaK = {Trusted,_} = 
  890: 	erl_make_certs:make_cert([{key, dsa},
  891: 			     {subject, [
  892: 					{name, "Public Key"},
  893: 					{?'id-at-name', {printableString, "public_key"}},
  894: 					{?'id-at-pseudonym', {printableString, "pubkey"}},
  895: 					{city, "Stockholm"},
  896: 					{country, "SE"},
  897: 					{org, "erlang"},
  898: 					{org_unit, "testing dep"}
  899: 				       ]}
  900: 			    ]),
  901:     ok = erl_make_certs:write_pem("./", "public_key_cacert", CaK),
  902: 
  903:     CertK1 = {Cert1, _} = erl_make_certs:make_cert([{issuer, CaK}]),
  904:     CertK2 = {Cert2,_} = erl_make_certs:make_cert([{issuer, CertK1}, 
  905: 					      {digest, md5}, {extensions, false}]),
  906:     ok = erl_make_certs:write_pem("./", "public_key_cert", CertK2),
  907:     
  908:     {ok, _} = public_key:pkix_path_validation(Trusted, [Cert1], []),
  909:     
  910:     {error, {bad_cert,invalid_issuer}} = 
  911: 	public_key:pkix_path_validation(Trusted, [Cert2], []),
  912:    
  913:     {ok, _} = public_key:pkix_path_validation(Trusted, [Cert1, Cert2], []),    
  914: 
  915:     {error, {bad_cert, duplicate_cert_in_path}} =
  916: 	public_key:pkix_path_validation(Trusted, [Cert1, Cert1, Cert2], []),
  917: 
  918:     {error, issuer_not_found} = public_key:pkix_issuer_id(Cert2, other),
  919: 
  920:     CertK3 = {Cert3,_}  = erl_make_certs:make_cert([{issuer, CertK1}, 
  921: 					       {extensions, [{basic_constraints, false}]}]),
  922:     {Cert4,_}  = erl_make_certs:make_cert([{issuer, CertK3}, {extensions, [{key_usage, undefined}]}]),
  923: 
  924:     {error, {bad_cert,missing_basic_constraint}} =
  925: 	public_key:pkix_path_validation(Trusted, [Cert1, Cert3,Cert4], []),
  926: 
  927:     VerifyFunAndState0  = {fun(_,{bad_cert, missing_basic_constraint}, UserState) ->
  928: 				   {valid, UserState};
  929: 			      (_,{bad_cert, _} = Reason, _) ->
  930: 				   {fail, Reason};
  931: 			      (_,{extension, _}, UserState) ->
  932: 				   {unknown, UserState};
  933: 			      (_, valid, UserState) ->
  934: 				   {valid, UserState};
  935: 			      (_, valid_peer, UserState) ->
  936: 				   {valid, UserState}
  937: 			   end, []},
  938:     {ok, _} =
  939: 	public_key:pkix_path_validation(Trusted, [Cert1, Cert3,Cert4],
  940: 					[{verify_fun, VerifyFunAndState0}]),
  941: 
  942:     {error, {bad_cert, unknown_ca}} =
  943: 	public_key:pkix_path_validation(unknown_ca, [Cert1, Cert3, Cert4], []),
  944: 
  945:     VerifyFunAndState1 =
  946: 	{fun(_,{bad_cert, unknown_ca}, UserState) ->
  947: 		 {valid, UserState};
  948: 	    (_,{bad_cert, _} = Reason, _) ->
  949: 		 {fail, Reason};
  950: 	    (_,{extension, _}, UserState) ->
  951: 		 {unknown, UserState};
  952: 	    (_, valid, UserState) ->
  953: 		 {valid, UserState}
  954: 	 end, []},
  955: 
  956:     {ok, _} =
  957: 	public_key:pkix_path_validation(unknown_ca, [Cert1], [{verify_fun,
  958: 							      VerifyFunAndState1}]),
  959: 
  960:     VerifyFunAndState2 =
  961:         {fun(_, {bad_cert, selfsigned_peer}, _UserState) ->
  962:                   {fail, custom_reason};
  963:             (_,{extension, _}, UserState) ->
  964: 		          {unknown, UserState};
  965: 	        (_, valid, UserState) ->
  966: 		          {valid, UserState}
  967:         end, []},
  968: 
  969:     {error, custom_reason} =
  970:         public_key:pkix_path_validation(selfsigned_peer, [Trusted], [{verify_fun,
  971:                                                                       VerifyFunAndState2}]),
  972:     % check RSASSA-PSS key
  973:     % RsaPssKey = {public_key:generate_key({rsa, 1024, 65537}), pss_params(sha256)},
  974:     RsaPssKey = {hardcode_rsa_key(1), pss_params(sha256)},
  975: 
  976:     _CaKPSS = {TrustedPSSCert,_} = erl_make_certs:make_cert([{key, RsaPssKey},
  977:                  {subject, [
  978:                     {name, "RSASSA-PSS Public Key"},
  979:                     {?'id-at-name', {printableString, "public_key"}},
  980:                     {?'id-at-pseudonym', {printableString, "pubkey"}},
  981:                     {city, "Stockholm"},
  982:                     {country, "SE"},
  983:                     {org, "erlang"},
  984:                     {org_unit, "testing dep"}
  985:                        ]}
  986:                 ]),
  987:     _ChainPSSCert = {CertPSS, _} = erl_make_certs:make_cert([{issuer, {TrustedPSSCert,RsaPssKey}}]),
  988:     {ok, _} = public_key:pkix_path_validation(TrustedPSSCert, [CertPSS], []).
  989: 
  990: pkix_path_validation_root_expired() ->
  991:     [{doc, "Test root expiration so that it does not fall between chairs"}].
  992: pkix_path_validation_root_expired(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  993:     {Year, Month, Day} = date(),
  994:     SRoot = public_key:pkix_test_root_cert("OTP test server ROOT", [{validity, {{Year-2, Month, Day}, 
  995:                                                                                 {Year-1, Month, Day}}}]),
  996:     #{server_config := Conf} = public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => SRoot,
  997:                                                                              intermediates => [],
  998:                                                                              peer => []},
  999:                                                            client_chain => #{root => [], 
 1000:                                                                              intermediates => [],
 1001:                                                                              peer => []}}),
 1002:     [ICA, Root] = proplists:get_value(cacerts, Conf),
 1003:     true = public_key:pkix_is_self_signed(Root),
 1004:     Peer = proplists:get_value(cert, Conf),
 1005:     {error, {bad_cert, cert_expired}} = public_key:pkix_path_validation(Root, [ICA, Peer], []).
 1006:     
 1007: pkix_ext_key_usage() ->
 1008:     [{doc, "Extended key usage is usually in end entity certs, may be in CA but should not be critical in such case"}].
 1009: pkix_ext_key_usage(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1010:     SRootSpec = public_key:pkix_test_root_cert("OTP test server ROOT", []),
 1011:     CRootSpec = public_key:pkix_test_root_cert("OTP test client ROOT", []),
 1012: 
 1013:     FailCAExt = [#'Extension'{extnID = ?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
 1014:                               extnValue = [?'anyExtendedKeyUsage'],
 1015:                               critical = true}],
 1016:     CAExt = [#'Extension'{extnID = ?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
 1017:                           extnValue = [?'anyExtendedKeyUsage'],
 1018:                           critical = false}],
 1019: 
 1020:     #{server_config := SConf,
 1021:       client_config := CConf} = public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => SRootSpec,
 1022:                                                                              intermediates => [[{extensions, FailCAExt}]],
 1023:                                                                              peer => []},
 1024:                                                            client_chain => #{root => CRootSpec,
 1025:                                                                              intermediates => [[{extensions, CAExt}]],
 1026:                                                                              peer => []}}),
 1027:     [_STRoot, SICA, SRoot] = proplists:get_value(cacerts, SConf),
 1028:     [_CTRoot, CICA, CRoot] = proplists:get_value(cacerts, CConf),
 1029:     SPeer = proplists:get_value(cert, SConf),
 1030:     CPeer = proplists:get_value(cert, CConf),
 1031: 
 1032:     {error, {bad_cert, invalid_ext_key_usage}} = public_key:pkix_path_validation(SRoot, [SICA, SPeer], []),
 1033: 
 1034:     {ok, _} = public_key:pkix_path_validation(CRoot, [CICA, CPeer], []).
 1035: 
 1036: pkix_path_validation_bad_date() ->
 1037:     [{doc, "Ensure bad date formats in `validity` are handled gracefully by verify fun"}].
 1038: pkix_path_validation_bad_date(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1039:     % Load PEM certchain from file
 1040:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1041:     {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(filename:join(DataDir,"bad_date_certchain.pem")),
 1042: 
 1043:     % Decode and extract raw der encoded certificates
 1044:     CertificateList = public_key:pem_decode(Bin),
 1045:     [Root | CertificateChain] = lists:map(fun({'Certificate', Der, _}) -> Der end, CertificateList),
 1046: 
 1047:     % First test error `invalid_validity_dates` being returned correctly without `verify_fun` override
 1048:     {error, {bad_cert, invalid_validity_dates}} = public_key:pkix_path_validation(Root, CertificateChain, []),
 1049: 
 1050:     % Then test no exception thrown if verify_fun function traps the date error
 1051:     {ok, _} = public_key:pkix_path_validation(Root, CertificateChain, [
 1052:        {verify_fun, % This is the same as ?DEFAULT_VERIFYFUN, but it handles `invalid_validity_dates` gracefully.
 1053:             {fun
 1054:                 % Test if we can successfully override `invalid_validity_dates`
 1055:                 (_, {bad_cert, invalid_validity_dates}, UserState) ->
 1056:                     {valid, UserState};
 1057:                 (_,{extension, _}, UserState) ->
 1058: 		            {unknown, UserState};
 1059:                 (_, valid_peer, UserState) ->
 1060: 				    {valid, UserState};
 1061:                 (_, valid, UserState) ->
 1062:                     {valid, UserState}
 1063:             end, []}
 1064:         }
 1065:     ]).
 1066: 
 1067: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1068: %% To generate the PEM file contents:
 1069: %%
 1070: %% openssl req -x509 -nodes -newkey rsa:1024 -keyout /dev/null -subj '/C=SE/CN=example.com/CN=*.foo.example.com/CN=a*b.bar.example.com/O=erlang.org' > public_key_SUITE_data/pkix_verify_hostname_cn.pem
 1071: %%
 1072: %% Note that the same pem-file is used in pkix_verify_hostname_options/1
 1073: %%
 1074: %% Subject: C=SE, CN=example.com, CN=*.foo.example.com, CN=a*b.bar.example.com, O=erlang.org
 1075: %% extensions = no subjAltName
 1076: 
 1077: pkix_verify_hostname_cn(Config) ->
 1078:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1079:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(filename:join(DataDir,"pkix_verify_hostname_cn.pem")),
 1080:     Cert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(element(2,hd(public_key:pem_decode(Bin))), otp),
 1081: 
 1082:     %% Check that 1) only CNs are checked,
 1083:     %%            2) an empty label does not match a wildcard and
 1084:     %%            3) a wildcard does not match more than one label
 1085:     false = public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"erlang.org"},
 1086: 						   {dns_id,"foo.EXAMPLE.com"},
 1087: 						   {dns_id,"b.a.foo.EXAMPLE.com"}]),
 1088: 
 1089:     %% Check that a hostname is extracted from a https-uri and used for checking:
 1090:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"HTTPS://EXAMPLE.com"}]),
 1091: 
 1092:     %% Check wildcard matching one label:
 1093:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"a.foo.EXAMPLE.com"}]),
 1094: 
 1095:     %% Check wildcard with surrounding chars matches one label:
 1096:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"accb.bar.EXAMPLE.com"}]),
 1097: 
 1098:     %% Check that a wildcard with surrounding chars matches an empty string:
 1099:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"https://ab.bar.EXAMPLE.com"}]).
 1100: 
 1101: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1102: %% To generate the PEM file contents:
 1103: %%
 1104: %% openssl req -x509 -nodes -newkey rsa:1024 -keyout /dev/null -extensions SAN -config  public_key_SUITE_data/verify_hostname.conf 2>/dev/null > public_key_SUITE_data/pkix_verify_hostname_subjAltName.pem
 1105: %%
 1106: %% Subject: C=SE, CN=example.com
 1107: %% Subject Alternative Name: DNS:kb.example.org, DNS:*.example.org, URI:http://www.example.org, URI:https://wws.example.org
 1108: 
 1109: pkix_verify_hostname_subjAltName(Config) ->
 1110:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1111:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(filename:join(DataDir,"pkix_verify_hostname_subjAltName.pem")),
 1112:     Cert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(element(2,hd(public_key:pem_decode(Bin))), otp),
 1113: 
 1114:     %% Check that neither a uri nor dns hostname matches a CN if subjAltName is present:
 1115:     false = public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"https://example.com"},
 1116: 						   {dns_id,"example.com"}]),
 1117: 
 1118:     %% Check that a uri_id matches a URI subjAltName:
 1119:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"https://wws.example.org"}]),
 1120: 
 1121:     %% Check that a dns_id does not match a URI subjAltName:
 1122:     false = public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"www.example.org"},
 1123: 						   {dns_id,"wws.example.org"}]),
 1124: 
 1125:     %% Check that a dns_id matches a DNS subjAltName:
 1126:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"kb.example.org"}]),
 1127:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"KB.EXAMPLE.ORG"}]),
 1128: 
 1129:     %% Check that a dns_id does not match a DNS subjAltName with wildcard
 1130:     false =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"other.example.org"}]),
 1131: 
 1132:     %% Check that a dns_id does match a DNS subjAltName with wildcard with matchfun
 1133:     MatchFun = {match_fun, public_key:pkix_verify_hostname_match_fun(https)},
 1134:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"other.example.org"}], [MatchFun]),
 1135:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"OTHER.EXAMPLE.ORG"}], [MatchFun]),
 1136: 
 1137:     %% Check that a uri_id does not match a DNS subjAltName with wildcard
 1138:     false =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"https://other.example.org"}]),
 1139:     false =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"https://OTHER.EXAMPLE.ORG"}]),
 1140: 
 1141:     %% Check that a dns_id does match a DNS subjAltName with wildcard with matchfun
 1142:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"https://other.example.org"}], [MatchFun]),
 1143:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"https://OTHER.EXAMPLE.ORG"}], [MatchFun]),
 1144:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"https://OTHER.example.org"}], [MatchFun]),
 1145: 
 1146:     ok.
 1147: 
 1148: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1149: %% Uses the pem-file for pkix_verify_hostname_cn
 1150: %% Subject: C=SE, CN=example.com, CN=*.foo.example.com, CN=a*b.bar.example.com, O=erlang.org
 1151: pkix_verify_hostname_options(Config) ->
 1152:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1153:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(filename:join(DataDir,"pkix_verify_hostname_cn.pem")),
 1154:     Cert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(element(2,hd(public_key:pem_decode(Bin))), otp),
 1155:     
 1156:     %% Check that the fail_callback is called and is presented the correct certificate:
 1157:     true = public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"erlang.org"}],
 1158: 					   [{fail_callback,
 1159: 					     fun(#'OTPCertificate'{}=C) when C==Cert -> 
 1160: 						     true; % To test the return value matters
 1161: 						(#'OTPCertificate'{}=C) -> 
 1162: 						     ct:log("~p:~p: Wrong cert:~n~p~nExpect~n~p",
 1163: 							    [?MODULE, ?LINE, C, Cert]),
 1164: 						     ct:fail("Wrong cert, see log");
 1165: 						(C) -> 
 1166: 						     ct:log("~p:~p: Bad cert: ~p",[?MODULE,?LINE,C]),
 1167: 						     ct:fail("Bad cert, see log")
 1168: 					     end}]),
 1169:     
 1170:     %% Check the callback for user-provided match functions:
 1171:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"very.wrong.domain"}],
 1172: 					    [{match_fun,
 1173: 					      fun("very.wrong.domain", {cn,"example.com"}) ->
 1174: 						      true;
 1175: 						 (_, _) ->
 1176: 						      false
 1177: 					      end}]),
 1178:     false = public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"not.example.com"}],
 1179: 					    [{match_fun, fun(_, _) -> default end}]),
 1180:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"example.com"}],
 1181: 					    [{match_fun, fun(_, _) -> default end}]),
 1182: 
 1183:     %% Check the callback for user-provided fqdn extraction:
 1184:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"some://very.wrong.domain"}],
 1185: 					    [{fqdn_fun,
 1186: 					      fun({uri_id, "some://very.wrong.domain"}) ->
 1187: 						      "example.com";
 1188: 						 (_) ->
 1189: 						      ""
 1190: 					      end}]),
 1191:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"https://example.com"}],
 1192: 					    [{fqdn_fun, fun(_) -> default end}]),
 1193:     false =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"some://very.wrong.domain"}]),
 1194: 
 1195:     true = public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"example.com"}]),
 1196:     true = public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"abb.bar.example.com"}]),
 1197:     false = public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"example.com"},
 1198:                                                    {dns_id,"abb.bar.example.com"}],
 1199:                                             [{fqdn_fun,fun(_)->undefined end}]),
 1200:     %% Test that a common name is matched fully, that is do not allow prefix matches
 1201:     %% with less dots (".")
 1202:     {ok, PrefixBin} = file:read_file(filename:join(DataDir,"prefix-dots.pem")),
 1203:     PrefixCert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(element(2,hd(public_key:pem_decode(PrefixBin))), otp),
 1204:     true = public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(PrefixCert, [{dns_id,"..a"}]),
 1205:     false = public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(PrefixCert, [{dns_id,".a"}]).
 1206: 
 1207: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1208: %% To generate the PEM file contents:
 1209: %%
 1210: %% openssl req -x509 -nodes -newkey rsa:1024 -keyout /dev/null -extensions SAN -config  public_key_SUITE_data/verify_hostname_ip.conf 2>/dev/null > public_key_SUITE_data/pkix_verify_hostname_subjAltName_IP.pem
 1211: %%
 1212: %% Subject: C=SE, CN=example.com
 1213: %% Subject Alternative Name: DNS:1.2.3.4, DNS: abcd:ef::1, IP:10.67.16.75, URI:https://10.11.12.13
 1214: 
 1215: pkix_verify_hostname_subjAltName_IP(Config) ->
 1216:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1217:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(filename:join(DataDir,"pkix_verify_hostname_subjAltName_IP.pem")),
 1218:     Cert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(element(2,hd(public_key:pem_decode(Bin))), otp),
 1219: 
 1220:     %% Print the tests that a matchfun has to handle
 1221:     catch public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{some_tag,"some.domain"},
 1222:                                                  {ip, {10,67,16,75}}
 1223:                                                 ],
 1224:                                           [{match_fun,
 1225:                                             fun(Ref,Pres) -> 
 1226:                                                     ct:log("~p:~p:~nRef : ~p~nPres: ~p",[?MODULE,?LINE,Ref,Pres]),
 1227:                                                     false
 1228:                                             end}]),
 1229: 
 1230:     false =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"https://1.2.3.4"}]),
 1231:     true  =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"https://10.11.12.13"}]),
 1232:     true  =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"1.2.3.4"}]),
 1233:     true  =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,<<"1.2.3.4">>}]),
 1234:     false =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"10.67.16.75"}]),
 1235:     true  =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{ip, "aBcD:ef:0::0:1"}]),
 1236:     true  =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{ip, {16#abcd,16#ef,0,0,0,0,0,1}}]),
 1237:     true  =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{ip, "10.67.16.75"}]),
 1238:     true  =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{ip, <<"10.67.16.75">>}]),
 1239:     true  =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{ip, {10,67,16,75}}]),
 1240:     false =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{ip, {1,2,3,4}}]),
 1241:     false =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{ip, {10,11,12,13}}]).
 1242: 
 1243: 
 1244: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1245: 
 1246: pkix_dist_point_uri() ->
 1247:  [{doc, "Disregard ldap URIs in code path handling HTTP URIs"}].
 1248: pkix_dist_point_uri(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1249:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1250:     {ok, PemCert} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "ldap_uri_cert.pem")),
 1251:     [{_, Cert, _}] = public_key:pem_decode(PemCert),
 1252:     #'OTPCertificate'{tbsCertificate = TBSCert} = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Cert, otp),
 1253: 
 1254:     Extensions = pubkey_cert:extensions_list(TBSCert#'OTPTBSCertificate'.extensions),
 1255:     DpExt = pubkey_cert:select_extension(?'id-ce-cRLDistributionPoints', Extensions),
 1256:     #'Extension'{extnValue = DPs} = DpExt,
 1257:     [#'DistributionPoint'{distributionPoint = {fullName, DPNames}}|_] = DPs,
 1258:     ct:log("~p", [DPNames]),
 1259:     true = pubkey_crl:match_one(DPNames, [{uniformResourceIdentifier, "http://ca.eait.uq.edu.au/crl/labs-LILY-CA"}]).
 1260: 
 1261: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1262: 
 1263: pkix_iso_rsa_oid() ->
 1264:  [{doc, "Test workaround for supporting certs that use ISO oids"
 1265:    " 1.3.14.3.2.29 instead of PKIX/PKCS oid"}].
 1266: pkix_iso_rsa_oid(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1267:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1268:     {ok, PemCert} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "rsa_ISO.pem")),
 1269:     [{_, Cert, _}] = public_key:pem_decode(PemCert),
 1270:     OTPCert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Cert, otp),
 1271:     SigAlg = OTPCert#'OTPCertificate'.signatureAlgorithm,
 1272:     {_, rsa} = public_key:pkix_sign_types(SigAlg#'SignatureAlgorithm'.algorithm).
 1273: 
 1274: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1275: pkix_iso_dsa_oid() ->
 1276:  [{doc, "Test workaround for supporting certs that use ISO oids"
 1277:    "1.3.14.3.2.27 instead of PKIX/PKCS oid"}].
 1278: pkix_iso_dsa_oid(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1279:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1280:     {ok, PemCert} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "dsa_ISO.pem")),
 1281:     [{_, Cert, _}] = public_key:pem_decode(PemCert),
 1282:     OTPCert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Cert, otp),
 1283:     SigAlg = OTPCert#'OTPCertificate'.signatureAlgorithm,
 1284:     {_, dsa} = public_key:pkix_sign_types(SigAlg#'SignatureAlgorithm'.algorithm).
 1285: 
 1286: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1287: pkix_dsa_sha2_oid() ->
 1288:  [{doc, "Test support dsa_sha2 oid"}].
 1289: pkix_dsa_sha2_oid(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1290:     {sha224, dsa} = public_key:pkix_sign_types(?'id-dsa-with-sha224'),
 1291:     {sha256, dsa} = public_key:pkix_sign_types(?'id-dsa-with-sha256').
 1292:     
 1293: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1294: 
 1295: pkix_crl() ->
 1296:     [{doc, "test pkix_crl_* functions"}].
 1297: 
 1298: pkix_crl(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1299:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1300:     {ok, PemCRL} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "idp_crl.pem")),
 1301:     [{_, CRL, _}] = public_key:pem_decode(PemCRL),
 1302:     
 1303:     {ok, IDPPemCert} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "idp_cert.pem")),
 1304:     [{_, IDPCert, _}] = public_key:pem_decode(IDPPemCert),
 1305: 
 1306:     {ok, SignPemCert} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "crl_signer.pem")),
 1307:     [{_, SignCert, _}] = public_key:pem_decode(SignPemCert),
 1308:     
 1309:     OTPIDPCert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(IDPCert, otp),
 1310:     OTPSignCert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(SignCert, otp),
 1311:     ERLCRL = public_key:der_decode('CertificateList',CRL),
 1312: 
 1313:     {rdnSequence,_} = public_key:pkix_crl_issuer(CRL),
 1314:     {rdnSequence,_} = public_key:pkix_crl_issuer(ERLCRL),
 1315:     
 1316:     true = public_key:pkix_crl_verify(CRL, SignCert),
 1317:     true = public_key:pkix_crl_verify(ERLCRL, OTPSignCert),
 1318: 
 1319:     [#'DistributionPoint'{}|_] = public_key:pkix_dist_points(IDPCert),
 1320:     [#'DistributionPoint'{}|_] = public_key:pkix_dist_points(OTPIDPCert),
 1321: 
 1322:     #'DistributionPoint'{cRLIssuer = asn1_NOVALUE,
 1323:      			 reasons = asn1_NOVALUE,
 1324: 			 distributionPoint =  Point} = public_key:pkix_dist_point(IDPCert),
 1325:     #'DistributionPoint'{cRLIssuer = asn1_NOVALUE,
 1326: 			 reasons = asn1_NOVALUE,
 1327: 			 distributionPoint =  Point} = public_key:pkix_dist_point(OTPIDPCert).
 1328: 
 1329: general_name() ->
 1330:     [{doc, "Test that decoding of general name filed may have other values"
 1331:       " than {rdnSequence,  Seq}"}].
 1332: 
 1333: general_name(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1334:     DummyRfc822Name = "CN=CNDummy, OU=OUDummy, O=ODummy, C=SE",
 1335:     {ok, {1,  DummyRfc822Name}} = 
 1336: 	pubkey_cert:cert_auth_key_id(
 1337: 	  #'AuthorityKeyIdentifier'{authorityCertIssuer = 
 1338: 					[{rfc822Name, DummyRfc822Name}],
 1339: 				    authorityCertSerialNumber = 
 1340: 					1}).
 1341:

 1345:      [{doc, "Test API function pkix_hash_type/1"}].
 1346: 
 1347: pkix_hash_type(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1348:     sha = public_key:pkix_hash_type(?'id-sha1'), 
 1349:     sha512 = public_key:pkix_hash_type(?'id-sha512'),
 1350:     sha384 = public_key:pkix_hash_type(?'id-sha384'),
 1351:     sha256 = public_key:pkix_hash_type(?'id-sha256'), 
 1352:     sha224 = public_key:pkix_hash_type('id-sha224'),
 1353:     md5 = public_key:pkix_hash_type('id-md5').

 1356: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1357: 
 1358: pkix_test_data_all_default() ->
 1359:     [{doc, "Test API function pkix_test_data/1"}].
 1360: 
 1361: pkix_test_data_all_default(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1362:     #{server_config := ServerConf0,
 1363:       client_config := ClientConf0} = public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => 
 1364:                                                                      #{root => [],
 1365:                                                                        intermediates => [[]],
 1366:                                                                        peer => []},
 1367:                                                                  client_chain => 
 1368:                                                                      #{root => [],
 1369:                                                                        intermediates => [[]],
 1370:                                                                        peer => []}}),
 1371:     check_conf_member(ServerConf0, [key, cert, cacerts]),
 1372:     check_conf_member(ClientConf0, [key, cert, cacerts]),
 1373:     
 1374:     3 = length(proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerConf0)),
 1375:     3 = length(proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerConf0)),
 1376: 
 1377:     #{server_config := ServerConf1,
 1378:       client_config := ClientConf1} = public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => 
 1379:                                                                      #{root => [],
 1380:                                                                        peer => []},
 1381:                                                                  client_chain => 
 1382:                                                                      #{root => [],
 1383:                                                                        peer => []}}),
 1384:     2 = length(proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerConf1)),
 1385:     2 = length(proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerConf1)),
 1386:     
 1387:     check_conf_member(ServerConf1, [key, cert, cacerts]),
 1388:     check_conf_member(ClientConf1, [key, cert, cacerts]).
 1389:     
 1390: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1391: 
 1392: pkix_test_data() ->
 1393:     [{doc, "Test API function pkix_test_data/1"}].
 1394: 
 1395: pkix_test_data(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1396:     {Year, Month, Day} = date(),
 1397:     Keygen = 
 1398:         case crypto:ec_curves() of
 1399:         [] ->
 1400:             {rsa, 2048, 17};
 1401:         [Curve |_] ->
 1402:             Oid = pubkey_cert_records:namedCurves(Curve),
 1403:             {namedCurve, Oid}
 1404:         end,
 1405:     #{server_config := ServerConf0,
 1406:       client_config := ClientConf0} = 
 1407:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => 
 1408:                                         #{root => [],
 1409:                                           intermediates => [],
 1410:                                           peer => [{key, hardcode_rsa_key(1)}]},
 1411:                                     client_chain => 
 1412:                                         #{root => [{validity, {{Year-2, Month, Day}, 
 1413:                                                                {Year-1, Month, Day}}}],
 1414:                                           intermediates => 
 1415:                                               [[{extensions, [#'Extension'{extnID = ?'id-ce-basicConstraints',
 1416:                                                                            extnValue = #'BasicConstraints'{cA=true, 
 1417:                                                                                              pathLenConstraint = 1},
 1418:                                                                            critical = true}]}]],
 1419:                                                peer => [{key, Keygen}, {digest, sha1}]}}),
 1420:     check_conf_member(ServerConf0, [key, cert, cacerts]),
 1421:     check_conf_member(ClientConf0, [key, cert, cacerts]).
 1422: 
 1423:    
 1424:                                  
 1425: check_conf_member(_, []) ->
 1426:     true;
 1427: check_conf_member(Conf, [Member | Rest]) ->
 1428:     case lists:keymember(Member, 1, Conf) of
 1429:         true ->
 1430:             check_conf_member(Conf, Rest);
 1431:         false ->
 1432:             ct:fail({misssing_conf, Member})
 1433:     end.
 1434:                               
 1435: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1436: pkix_is_issuer() ->
 1437:     [{doc, "Test pubkey_cert:pkix_is_issuer with cert that have diffent cases on countryname"}].
 1438: 
 1439: pkix_is_issuer(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1440:     Upper = {rdnSequence,
 1441:              [[{'AttributeTypeAndValue',{2,5,4,6},"GB"}],
 1442:               [{'AttributeTypeAndValue',{2,5,4,10},{utf8String,<<"MYORG">>}}],
 1443:               [{'AttributeTypeAndValue',{2,5,4,11},{utf8String,<<"INTERMEDIATE">>}}],
 1444:               [{'AttributeTypeAndValue',{2,5,4,3},{utf8String,<<"INTERMEDIATE">>}}]]},
 1445:     Lower = {rdnSequence,
 1446:              [[{'AttributeTypeAndValue',{2,5,4,6},"gb"}],
 1447:               [{'AttributeTypeAndValue',{2,5,4,10},{utf8String,<<"MYORG">>}}],
 1448:               [{'AttributeTypeAndValue',{2,5,4,11},{utf8String,<<"INTERMEDIATE">>}}],
 1449:               [{'AttributeTypeAndValue',{2,5,4,3},{utf8String,<<"INTERMEDIATE">>}}]]},
 1450:     true = pubkey_cert:is_issuer(Upper, Lower).
 1451: 
 1452: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1453: short_cert_issuer_hash() ->
 1454:     [{doc, "Test OpenSSL-style hash for certificate issuer"}].
 1455: 
 1456: short_cert_issuer_hash(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1457:     Datadir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
 1458:     [{'Certificate', CertDER, _}] =
 1459: 	erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "client_cert.pem")),
 1460: 
 1461:     %% This hash value was obtained by running:
 1462:     %% openssl x509 -in client_cert.pem -issuer_hash -noout
 1463:     CertIssuerHash = "d4c8d7e5",
 1464: 
 1465:     #'OTPCertificate'{tbsCertificate = #'OTPTBSCertificate'{issuer = Issuer}} =
 1466: 	public_key:pkix_decode_cert(CertDER, otp),
 1467: 
 1468:     CertIssuerHash = public_key:short_name_hash(Issuer).
 1469: 
 1470: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1471: short_crl_issuer_hash() ->
 1472:     [{doc, "Test OpenSSL-style hash for CRL issuer"}].
 1473: 
 1474: short_crl_issuer_hash(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1475:     Datadir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
 1476:     [{'CertificateList', CrlDER, _}] =
 1477: 	erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "idp_crl.pem")),
 1478: 
 1479:     %% This hash value was obtained by running:
 1480:     %% openssl crl -in idp_crl.pem -hash -noout
 1481:     CrlIssuerHash = "d6134ed3",
 1482: 
 1483:     Issuer = public_key:pkix_crl_issuer(CrlDER),
 1484: 
 1485:     CrlIssuerHash = public_key:short_name_hash(Issuer).
 1486:
