 1589: 
 1590: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1591: cacerts_load() ->
 1592:     [{doc, "Basic tests of cacerts functionality"}].
 1593: cacerts_load(Config) ->
 1594:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1595:     {error, enoent} = public_key:cacerts_load("/dummy.file"),
 1596: 
 1597:     %% White box testing of paths loading
 1598:     %% TestDirs
 1599:     ok = pubkey_os_cacerts:load([filename:join(Datadir, "non_existing_dir"),
 1600:                                  Datadir,
 1601:                                  filename:join(Datadir, "cacerts.pem")
 1602:                                 ]),
 1603:     true = 10 < length(public_key:cacerts_get()),
 1604:     %% We currently pick the first found in input order
 1605:     ok = pubkey_os_cacerts:load([filename:join(Datadir, "non_existing_file"),
 1606:                                  filename:join(Datadir, "ldap_uri_cert.pem"),
 1607:                                  filename:join(Datadir, "cacerts.pem")]),
 1608:     1 = length(public_key:cacerts_get()),
 1609:     ok = pubkey_os_cacerts:load([filename:join(Datadir, "non_existing_file"),
 1610:                                  filename:join(Datadir, "cacerts.pem"),
 1611:                                  filename:join(Datadir, "ldap_uri_cert.pem")]),
 1612:     2 = length(public_key:cacerts_get()),
 1613: 
 1614:     true = public_key:cacerts_clear(),
 1615: 
 1616:     LinkedCaCerts = filename:join(Datadir, "link_to_cacerts.pem"),
 1617:     case file:make_symlink(filename:join(Datadir, "cacerts.pem"), LinkedCaCerts) of
 1618:         ok ->
 1619:             ok = pubkey_os_cacerts:load([LinkedCaCerts]),
 1620:             2 = length(public_key:cacerts_get()),
 1621:             true = public_key:cacerts_clear(),
 1622:             ok = file:delete(LinkedCaCerts);
 1623:         _ ->
 1624:             ok
 1625:     end,
 1626: 
 1627:     %% Load default OS certs
 1628:     %%    there is no default installed OS certs on netbsd
 1629:     %%    can be installed with 'pkgin install mozilla-rootcerts'
 1630:     IsNetBsd = element(2, os:type()) =:= netbsd,
 1631:     OsCerts = try
 1632:                   Certs = public_key:cacerts_get(),
 1633:                   true = public_key:cacerts_clear(),
 1634:                   Certs
 1635:               catch _:{badmatch, {error, enoent}} when IsNetBsd -> netbsd
 1636:               end,
 1637: 
 1638:     false = public_key:cacerts_clear(),
 1639: 
 1640:     %% Reload from file
 1641:     ok = public_key:cacerts_load(filename:join(Datadir, "cacerts.pem")),
 1642:     [_TestCert1, _TestCert2] = public_key:cacerts_get(),
 1643: 
 1644:     %% Re-Load default OS certs
 1645:     try
 1646:         process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1647:         flush(),
 1648:         ok = public_key:cacerts_load(),
 1649:         [] = flush(),
 1650:         ct:log("~p: ~p~n", [os:type(), length(OsCerts)]),
 1651:         OsCerts = public_key:cacerts_get(),
 1652:         Ids = cert_info(OsCerts),
 1653:         Check = fun(ShouldBeThere) ->
 1654:                         lists:any(fun(#{id:=Id}) -> lists:prefix(ShouldBeThere, Id) end, Ids)
 1655:                 end,
 1656:         case lists:partition(Check, ["digicert", "globalsign"]) of
 1657:             {_, []} -> ok;
 1658:             {_, Fail} ->
 1659:                 cert_info(OsCerts),
 1660:                 [] = Fail
 1661:         end,
 1662:         ok
 1663:     catch _:{badmatch, {error, enoent}} when IsNetBsd ->
 1664:             ok
 1665:     end.
 1666: 
 1667: flush() ->
 1668:     receive Msg -> [Msg|flush()]
 1669:     after 500 -> []
 1670:     end.
 1671: 
 1672: cert_info([#cert{der=Der, otp=#'OTPCertificate'{tbsCertificate = C0}=Cert}|Rest]) when is_binary(Der) ->
 1673:     #'OTPTBSCertificate'{subject = Subject, serialNumber = _Nr, issuer = Issuer0} = C0,
 1674:     C = case public_key:pkix_is_self_signed(Cert) of
 1675:             true  -> #{id => subject(Subject), ss => true};
 1676:             false ->
 1677:                 case public_key:pkix_issuer_id(Cert, other) of
 1678:                     {ok, {_IsNr, Issuer}} ->
 1679:                         #{id => subject(Subject), ss => false, issuer => subject(Issuer)};
 1680:                     {error, _} ->
 1681:                         #{id => subject(Subject), ss => false, issuer => subject(Issuer0)}
 1682:                 end
 1683:         end,
 1684:     [C|cert_info(Rest)];
 1685: cert_info([]) ->
 1686:     [].
 1687: 
 1688: 
 1689: subject(S) ->
 1690:     string:lowercase(subject(public_key:pkix_normalize_name(S), "unknown")).
 1691: 
 1692: subject({rdnSequence, Seq}, Def) ->
 1693:     subject(Seq, Def);
 1694: subject([[{'AttributeTypeAndValue', ?'id-at-commonName', Name0}]|_], _Def) ->
 1695:     case Name0 of
 1696:         {printableString, Name} -> Name;
 1697:         {utf8String, Name} -> unicode:characters_to_list(Name);
 1698:         Name -> Name
 1699:     end;
 1700: subject([[{'AttributeTypeAndValue', ?'id-at-organizationName', Name0}]|Rest], _Def) ->
 1701:     Name = case Name0 of
 1702:                {printableString, Name1} -> Name1;
 1703:                {utf8String, Name1} -> unicode:characters_to_list(Name1);
 1704:                Name1 -> Name1
 1705:            end,
 1706:     subject(Rest, Name);
 1707: subject([_|R], Def) ->
 1708:     subject(R, Def);
 1709: subject([], Def) ->
 1710:     Def.
 1711: 
 1712: list_cacerts() ->
 1713:     Certs = public_key:cacerts_get(),
 1714:     %% io:format("~P~n",[Certs, 20]),
 1715:     IO = fun(C, N) -> io:format("~.3w:~0p~n", [N,C]), N+1 end,
 1716:     lists:foldl(IO, 0, lists:sort(cert_info(Certs))),
 1717:     ok.
 1718: 
 1719: 
 1720: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1721: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
 1722: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1723: asn1_encode_decode({Asn1Type, Der, not_encrypted} = Entry) ->
 1724:     Decoded = public_key:der_decode(Asn1Type, Der),
 1725:     Decoded = public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry),
 1726:     Entry = public_key:pem_entry_encode(Asn1Type, Decoded),
 1727:     ok.
 1728:     
 1729: check_countryname({rdnSequence,DirName}) ->
 1730:     do_check_countryname(DirName).
 1731: do_check_countryname([]) ->
 1732:     ok;
 1733: do_check_countryname([#'AttributeTypeAndValue'{type = ?'id-at-countryName',
 1734: 					       value = "US"}|_]) ->
 1735:     ok;
 1736: do_check_countryname([#'AttributeTypeAndValue'{type = ?'id-at-countryName',
 1737: 					       value =  Value}|_]) ->
 1738:     ct:fail({incorrect_country_name, Value});
 1739: do_check_countryname([_| Rest]) ->
 1740:     do_check_countryname(Rest).
 1741: 
 1742: check_emailaddress({rdnSequence,DirName}) ->
 1743:     do_check_emailaddress(DirName).
 1744: do_check_emailaddress([]) ->
 1745:     ok;
 1746: do_check_emailaddress([#'AttributeTypeAndValue'{type = ?'id-emailAddress',
 1747: 					       value = "invalid@email.com"}|_]) ->
 1748:     ok;
 1749: do_check_emailaddress([#'AttributeTypeAndValue'{type = ?'id-emailAddress',
 1750: 					       value =  Value}|_]) ->
 1751:     ct:fail({incorrect_email_address, Value});
 1752: do_check_emailaddress([_| Rest]) ->
 1753:     do_check_emailaddress(Rest).
 1754: 
 1755: check_entry_type(#'DSAPrivateKey'{}, 'DSAPrivateKey') ->
 1756:     true;
 1757: check_entry_type(#'RSAPrivateKey'{}, 'RSAPrivateKey') ->
 1758:     true;
 1759: check_entry_type(#'RSAPublicKey'{}, 'RSAPublicKey') ->
 1760:     true;
 1761: check_entry_type({_Int, #'Dss-Parms'{}}, 'DSAPublicKey') when is_integer(_Int) ->
 1762:     true;
 1763: check_entry_type(#'DHParameter'{}, 'DHParameter') ->
 1764:     true;
 1765: check_entry_type(#'Certificate'{}, 'Certificate') ->
 1766:     true;
 1767: check_entry_type({#'ECPoint'{}, _}, 'ECPoint') ->
 1768:     true;
 1769: check_entry_type(#'ECPrivateKey'{}, 'ECPrivateKey') ->
 1770:     true;
 1771: check_entry_type({namedCurve, _}, 'EcpkParameters') ->
 1772:     true;
 1773: check_entry_type({ecParameters, #'ECParameters'{}}, 'EcpkParameters') ->
 1774:     true;
 1775: check_entry_type(_,_) ->
 1776:     false.
 1777: 
 1778: check_encapsulated_header(Pem) when is_binary(Pem)->
 1779:     check_encapsulated_header( binary:split(Pem, <<"\n">>, [global]));
 1780: check_encapsulated_header([<<"DEK-Info: DES-CBC,FB7577791A9056A1">>, <<>> | _]) ->
 1781:     true;
 1782: check_encapsulated_header([ _ | Rest]) ->
 1783:     check_encapsulated_header(Rest);
 1784: check_encapsulated_header([]) ->
 1785:     false.
 1786: 
 1787: strip_superfluous_newlines(Bin) ->
 1788:     Str = string:strip(binary_to_list(Bin), right, 10),
 1789:     re:replace(Str,"\n\n","\n", [{return,list}, global]).
 1790: 
 1791: do_gen_ec_param(File) ->    
 1792:     {ok, KeyPem} = file:read_file(File),
 1793:     Entries = public_key:pem_decode(KeyPem),
 1794:     [ParamInfo] = [Entry || Entry={'EcpkParameters', _, not_encrypted} <- Entries],
 1795:     {ecParameters, Params} = public_key:pem_entry_decode(ParamInfo),
 1796:     Key = public_key:generate_key(Params),
 1797:     case check_entry_type(Key, 'ECPrivateKey') of
 1798:         true ->
 1799:             ok;
 1800:         false ->
 1801:             ct:fail({key_gen_fail, File})
 1802:     end.
 1803: 
 1804: init_per_testcase_gen_ec_param(_TC, Curve, Config) ->
 1805:     case crypto:ec_curves() of
 1806:         [] ->
 1807:             {skip, missing_ec_support};
 1808:         Curves ->
 1809:             case lists:member(Curve, Curves)
 1810:                 andalso crypto_supported_curve(Curve, Curves)
 1811:             of
 1812:                 true ->
 1813:                     init_common_per_testcase(Config);
 1814:                 false ->
 1815:                     {skip, {missing_ec_support, Curve}}
 1816:             end
 1817:     end.
 1818: 
 1819: 
 1820: crypto_supported_curve(Curve, _Curves) ->
 1821:     try crypto:generate_key(ecdh, Curve) of
 1822:         {error,_} -> false; % Just in case crypto is changed in the future...
 1823:         _-> true
 1824:     catch
 1825:         _:_-> false
 1826:     end.
